Event ID: 001
Event Name: Trainer(5)
(X,Y): (005,013)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trainer_ROCKETADEPT_M

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: pbTrainerIntro(:ROCKETADEPT_M)
@>Script: pbNoticePlayer(get_character(0))
@>Text: \bHow'd you get up here?
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:ROCKETADEPT_M,"Cole",_I("Unexpected."))
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbTrainerEnd
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 030
Event Name: EV030
(X,Y): (000,000)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Parallel Process

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch B == OFF
 @>Control Variables: [0004: Temp Move Name] = [StrengthBoulder]'s Map X
 @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = [StrengthBoulder]'s Map Y
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0004: Temp Move Name] == 9
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 10
   @>Comment: Is on switch.
   @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
   @>Play SE: 'Voltorb Flip explosion', 80, 100
   @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(27, "B", true)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(28, "B", true)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(29, "B", true)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(26, "B", true)
   @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Control Variables: [0004: Temp Move Name] = [StrengthBoulder]'s Map X
 @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = [StrengthBoulder]'s Map Y
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0004: Temp Move Name] != 9
  @>Comment: Boulder has been moved off the switch.
  @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(27, "B", false)
  :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(28, "B", false)
  :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(29, "B", false)
  :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(26, "B", false)
  @>Control Self Switch: B =OFF
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] != 10
   @>Comment: Boulder has been moved off the switch.
   @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(27, "B", false)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(28, "B", false)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(29, "B", false)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(26, "B", false)
   @>Control Self Switch: B =OFF
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 031
Event Name: pad1
(X,Y): (015,015)

Page #1
Conditions

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0052: Silph_Warp_Count] == 0
 @>Play SE: 'stat_upz', 80, 100
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)

(X,Y): (002,000)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Parallel Process

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch B == OFF
 @>Control Variables: [0004: Temp Move Name] = [boulder3]'s Map X
 @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = [boulder3]'s Map Y
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0004: Temp Move Name] == 8
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 8
   @>Comment: Is on switch.
   @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
   @>Play SE: 'Voltorb Flip explosion', 80, 100
   @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(38, "B", true)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(39, "B", true)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(40, "B", true)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(41, "B", true)
   @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Control Variables: [0004: Temp Move Name] = [boulder3]'s Map X
 @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = [boulder3]'s Map Y
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0004: Temp Move Name] != 8
  @>Comment: Boulder has been moved off the switch.
  @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(38, "B", false)
  :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(39, "B", false)
  :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(40, "B", false)
  :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(41, "B", false)
  @>Control Self Switch: B =OFF
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] != 8
   @>Comment: Boulder has been moved off the switch.
   @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(38, "B", false)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(39, "B", false)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(40, "B", false)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(41, "B", false)
   @>Control Self Switch: B =OFF
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>

  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 7
   @>Comment: Is on switch.
   @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
   @>Play SE: 'Voltorb Flip explosion', 80, 100
   @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(42, "B", true)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(43, "B", true)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(44, "B", true)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(45, "B", true)
   @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Control Variables: [0004: Temp Move Name] = [boulder4]'s Map X
 @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = [boulder4]'s Map Y
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0004: Temp Move Name] != 21
  @>Comment: Boulder has been moved off the switch.
  @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(42, "B", false)
  :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(43, "B", false)
  :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(44, "B", false)
  :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(45, "B", false)
  @>Control Self Switch: B =OFF
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] != 7
   @>Comment: Boulder has been moved off the switch.
   @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(42, "B", false)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(43, "B", false)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(44, "B", false)
   :       : pbSetSelfSwitch(45, "B", false)
   @>Control Self Switch: B =OFF
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 009
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
  @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
   :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
   :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?\nThe cost 
   :    : is $\v[3].
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
  :       : for i in 1..count
  :       :   pbSet(6,i)
  :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
  :       :   pbWait(16)
  :       : end
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation ON
  @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
  @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
   @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
   @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
    :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
   @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
    :    : exceptionally well.
   @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
   @>
  : Else

    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
    :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End

:       :         :SABLEEYE, :SCYTHER,
:       :         :DITTO, nil][pbGet(1)]
:       : price = [180, 500, 2000, 5000, 7777,
:       :          0][pbGet(1)]
:       : lv = [9, 8, 18, 21, 20, 0][pbGet(1)]

:       : pbSet(2, price)

:       :   data = GameData::Species.get(item)

:       : end
:       : pbSet(4, lv)

 @>Text: \CN\bSo, you want the \v[3]?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(2) > $Trainer.coins
   @>Text: \CN\bSorry, you'll need more coins than that.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbAddPokemon(pbGet(1), pbGet(4))
    @>Script: $Trainer.coins -= pbGet(2)
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End

:       :          0][pbGet(1)]
:       : lv = [9, 8, 18, 21, 20, 0][pbGet(1)]
@>Script: pbSet(1, item)
:       : pbSet(2, price)
:       : if item
:       :   data = GameData::Species.get(item)
:       :   pbSet(3, data.name)
:       : end
:       : pbSet(4, lv)
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] > 0
 @>Text: \CN\bSo, you want the \v[3]?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(2) > $Trainer.coins
   @>Text: \CN\bSorry, you'll need more coins than that.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbAddPokemon(pbGet(1), pbGet(4))
    @>Script: $Trainer.coins -= pbGet(2)
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 :    : Yellow Flute - 1600 coins,No thanks]
@>Script: item = [:SMOKEBALL, :MIRACLESEED,
:       :         :CHARCOAL, :MYSTICWATER,
:       :         :YELLOWFLUTE, nil][pbGet(1)]
:       : price = [800, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1600,
:       :          0][pbGet(1)]
@>Script: pbSet(1, item)

:       : if item
:       :   data = GameData::Item.get(item)
:       :   pbSet(3, data.name)
:       : end
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] > 0
 @>Text: \CN\bSo, you want the \v[3]?

 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(2) > $Trainer.coins

   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(pbGet(1))
    @>Script: $Trainer.coins -= pbGet(2)
    @>Script: pbReceiveItem(pbGet(1))
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \CN\bYou have no room in your Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 003
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (023,014)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
  @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
   :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
   :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?\nThe cost 
   :    : is $\v[3].
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
  :       : for i in 1..count
  :       :   pbSet(6,i)
  :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
  :       :   pbWait(16)
  :       : end
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation ON
  @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
  @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
   @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
   @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
    :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
   @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
    :    : exceptionally well.
   @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
   @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
    :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

    @>

  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]

  @>
 : Branch End

 @>

  :    : health.

  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0

  @>Play SE: 'GUI sel buzzer', 80, 100
  @>Text: No good, we're gonna have to try again!
  @>Text: <b>OPTIONAL</b>: Is this content too difficult?
   :    : Select SKIP to continue and bypass this challenge.
  @>Show Choices: Try Again, SKIP
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Try Again]
   @>Transfer Player:[116: Anthrophil Lab], (019,008)
   @>
  : When [SKIP]

   @>Show Choices: No, try again., Yes, skip.
   (When Cancel: Disallow)
   : When [No, try again.]
    @>Transfer Player:[116: Anthrophil Lab], (019,008)
    @>

   : Branch End

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 003
Event Name: Triple Triad explainer
(X,Y): (010,033)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 08

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rI'm here to explain the rules of Triple Triad.
@>Label: Choices
@>Text: \rWhich topic do you want to learn about?
@>Show Choices: Basics, Game rules, Prizes, Exit
(When Cancel: Choice 4)
: When [Basics]
 @>Text: \rTriple Triad is a game played with special square 
  :    : cards placed on a 3x3 board.
 @>Text: \rEach card has 4 numbers on it, one per side.  
  :    : These numbers are so-called stats.
 @>Text: \rPlayers take turns placing cards on the board. As 
  :    : they do so, they try to capture and gain control of 
  :    : their opponent's cards.
 @>Text: \rThat's where the numbers come in. If a player 
  :    : places a card with a higher number next to a card 
  :    : with a lower number, the player captures that card.
 @>Text: \rThus, the goal of the game is to gain control of more 
  :    : cards than the other player by the end of the game.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Game rules]
 @>Text: \rThere are a number of optional game rules you can 
  :    : apply to individual games.
 @>Text: \rThey can affect card stats, how cards capture 
  :    : each other, the scoring and the prizes.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Prizes]
 @>Text: \rWhen you win a game, you will recive 1 random 
  :    : card from your opponent from their Deck.
 @>Text: \rThis also works the other way around: if you lose, 
  :    : you have to give your opponent one of your cards, 
  :    : chosen at random.
 @>Text: \rYou can change what you win or lose from a game 
  :    : by using an optional game rule.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Exit]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 005
Event Name: Triple Triad explainer
(X,Y): (010,032)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rI'm here to explain the rules of Triple Triad.
@>Label: Choices
@>Text: \rWhich topic do you want to learn about?
@>Show Choices: Basics, Game rules, Prizes, Exit
(When Cancel: Choice 4)
: When [Basics]
 @>Text: \rTriple Triad is a game played with special square 
  :    : cards placed on a 3x3 board.
 @>Text: \rEach card has 4 numbers on it, one per side.  
  :    : These numbers are so-called stats.
 @>Text: \rPlayers take turns placing cards on the board. As 
  :    : they do so, they try to capture and gain control of 
  :    : their opponent's cards.
 @>Text: \rThat's where the numbers come in. If a player 
  :    : places a card with a higher number next to a card 
  :    : with a lower number, the player captures that card.
 @>Text: \rThus, the goal of the game is to gain control of more 
  :    : cards than the other player by the end of the game.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Game rules]
 @>Text: \rThere are a number of optional game rules you can 
  :    : apply to individual games.
 @>Text: \rThey can affect card stats, how cards capture 
  :    : each other, the scoring and the prizes.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Prizes]
 @>Text: \rWhen you win a game, you will recive 1 random 
  :    : card from your opponent from their Deck.
 @>Text: \rThis also works the other way around: if you lose, 
  :    : you have to give your opponent one of your cards, 
  :    : chosen at random.
 @>Text: \rYou can change what you win or lose from a game 
  :    : by using an optional game rule.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Exit]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 018
Event Name: EV018
(X,Y): (011,009)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \rWe can heal your Pokémon here with our legendary 
  :    : Chard Soup!
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
  @>Text: \rI'm sorry but these veggies aren't free!
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?\nThe cost 
   :    : is $\v[3].
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rAlright, see you next time.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rWe can heal your Pokémon here with our legendary 
  :    : Chard Soup!
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
  @>Screen Flash: (0,0,0,255), @60
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>Text: \rThere, all better!
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rOkay, be safe!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: /rI found you blacked out! Are you okay?
 :    : Let me check your Pokémon!
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 40 frame(s)
@>Text: /rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Counter(4)
(X,Y): (012,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 07

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This event can notice the player at a distance even 
 :       : though an impassable tile (the desk) is in the way. 
 :       : This is because this event's name contains the text 
 :       : "Counter(X)", where "X" is the number of tiles in front 
 :       : of itself that it can see.
@>Text: \bWelcome to the Safari Zone!
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Text: \G\bFor just $1500, you can play the Safari Game.
@>Text: \G\bYou can roam the wide-open safari and catch 
 :    : what you like.
@>Text: \G\bWould you like to play?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbBoxesFull?
  @>Text: \G\bSorry, your PC boxes are full.
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Move Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Gold 1499 or less
  @>Text: \G\bOops!\nNot enough money!
  @>Text: \G\bCome again.
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Move Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>Change Gold: - 1500
  @>Text: \G\bThat'll be $1500, please!
  @>Text: \G\bWe only use a special kind of Poké Ball here.
  @>Text: \G\PN received 30 Safari Balls from the attendant.
   :    : \me[Item get]\wtnp[40]
  @>Text: \G\bWe'll call you on the PA when you run out of time 
   :    : or Safari Balls.
  @>Text: \G\bWell, I'll wish you the best of luck!
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $game_player.x == 8
   @>Set Move Route: Player
    :              : $>Move Right
    :              : $>Move Up
    :              : $>Move Up
    :              : $>Change Opacity: 0
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $game_player.x == 10
    @>Set Move Route: Player
     :              : $>Move Left
     :              : $>Move Up
     :              : $>Move Up
     :              : $>Change Opacity: 0
    @>
   : Else
    @>Set Move Route: Player
     :              : $>Turn Up
     :              : $>Move Up
     :              : $>Move Up
     :              : $>Change Opacity: 0
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Script: pbSafariState.pbStart(30)
  @>Play SE: 'Door exit', 80, 100
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Change Opacity: 255
  @>Transfer Player:[022: Safari], (026,029), No Fade
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \G\bOkay.\nPlease come again!
 @>Set Move Route: Player
  :              : $>Move Down
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0025: s:pbInSafari? is ON

Graphic: NPC 07

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Move Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbSafariState.decision == 0
 @>Text: \bAre you going to leave the Safari Zone early?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \bPlease return any Safari Balls you may have left.
  @>Script: pbSafariState.pbEnd
  @>Set Move Route: Player
                    (Ignore If Can't Move)
   :              : $>Move Down
   :              : $>Move Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bGood luck!
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Move Up
   :              : $>Change Opacity: 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Play SE: 'Door exit', 80, 100
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Change Opacity: 255
  @>Transfer Player:[022: Safari], (026,029), No Fade
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbSafariState.decision == 1
 @>Text: \bDid you catch your fair share? Come again!
 @>Script: pbSafariState.pbEnd
 @>Set Move Route: Player
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Move Down
  :              : $>Move Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 003
Event Name: Move Relearner
(X,Y): (013,003)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 31

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: isTempSwitchOff?("A")
 @>Text: \bI'm the Pokémon Move Maniac.
 @>Text: \bIf you bring me a <b>HEARTSCALES</b> I can 
  :    : teach your Pokémon a move.
 @>Script: setTempSwitchOn("A")
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:HEARTSCALE)
 @>Text: \bYou've got a <b>HEARTSCALE</b> would you like 
  :    : to use it to learn a move?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ChoosePokemon
  @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon needs tutoring?
  @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1, 3, proc{ |pkmn|
  :       :   pkmn.can_relearn_move?
  :       :   }, true
  :       : )
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbGetPokemon(1).can_relearn_move?
   @>Text: \bSorry...
   @>Text: \bIt doesn't appear as if I have any move I can teach 
    :    : to your \v[3].
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Comment: If Game Variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player 
   :       : has canceled choosing a Pokémon.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
    :    : with a Heart Scale.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).egg?
    @>Text: \bHunh? There isn't a single move that I can teach an 
     :    : Egg.
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
    @>Text: \bNo way, I don't want to go near a Shadow 
     :    : Pokémon..
    @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: \bWhich move should I teach to your \v[3]?
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbRelearnMoveScreen(pbGetPokemon(1))
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:HEARTSCALE)
    @>Text: \PN handed over one Heart Scale in exchange.
    @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
     :    : with a Heart Scale.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
     :    : with a Heart Scale.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
   :    : with a Heart Scale.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \bIf your Pokémon need to learn a move, come back 
  :    : with a Heart Scale.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 004
Event Name: EV004
(X,Y): (014,003)

Page #1
Conditions

Graphic: NPC 30

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \bI can help your Pokémon forget moves.
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: ChoosePokemon
 @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon should forget a move?
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1,3)
 @>Comment: If variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has 
  :       : canceled choosing a Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
   :    : forgotten.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isEgg?
   @>Text: \bWhat? No Egg should know any moves.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: (pbGetPokemon(1).isShadow? rescue false)
   @>Text: \bWhat? I can't make a Shadow Pokémon forget a 
    :    : move.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).numMoves==1
   @>Text: \b\v[3] seems to know only one move...
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \bWhich move should be forgotten?
  @>Script: pbChooseMove(pbGetPokemon(1),2,4)
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 0
   @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \bHm! \v[3]'s \v[4]? That move should be forgotten?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Play ME: '013-Gag02', 100, 100
    @>Wait: 80 frame(s)
    @>Script: pbGetPokemon(1).pbDeleteMoveAtIndex(
    :       :    pbGet(2))
    @>Text: \bIt worked to perfection!
    @>Text: \b\v[3] has forgotten \v[4] completely.
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
     :    : forgotten.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
  :    : forgotten.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 005
Event Name: Name Rater
(X,Y): (001,003)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 17

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \bWant me to rate the nicknames of your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon's nickname should I critique?
 @>Comment: Opens a screen for choosing a Pokémon. The index 
  :       : is stored in Game Variable 1, and the name in Game 
  :       : Variable 3.
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1, 3)
 @>Comment: If Game Variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player 
  :       : has canceled choosing a Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: Check for eggs.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).egg?
  @>Text: \bNow, now... That is merely an Egg!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: Check for Shadow Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).shadowPokemon?
  @>Text: \bI wouldn't dare critique a Shadow Pokémon's name!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).foreign?($Trainer)
  @>Text: \bHmmm... \v[3] it is!
  @>Text: \bThis is a magnificent nickname! It is impeccably 
   :    : beyond reproach!
  @>Text: \bYou'll do well to cherish your \v[3] now and 
   :    : beyond.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Text: \b\v[3], is it?\nThat is a decent nickname!
 @>Text: \bBut, would you like me to give it a nicer name?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \bAh, good. Then, what shall the new nickname be?
  @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
  :       : species = pkmn.speciesName
  :       : pbSet(4, species)
  :       : pbTextEntry("#{species}'s nickname?",
  :       :   0, Pokemon::MAX_NAME_SIZE, 5)
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(5) == pbGet(3) || (pbGet(5) == "" && pbGet(3) == pbGet(4))
   @>Comment: The Pokémon's nickname wasn't changed.
   @>Text: \bI see. You're right, there's no need to change this 
    :    : Pokémon's nickname.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(5) == "" || pbGet(5) == pbGet(4)
    @>Comment: Resets the Pokémon's nickname to the species name.
    @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
    :       : pkmn.name = nil
    :       : pbSet(3, pkmn.name)
    @>Text: \bDone! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
     :    : as \v[3]!
    @>
   : Else
    @>Comment: Retrieves the Pokémon whose party index is stored in 
     :       : Game Variable 1, and changes its name to the name 
     :       : stored in Game Variable 5.
    @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
    :       : pkmn.name = pbGet(5)
    @>Text: \bDone! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
     :    : as \v[5]!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bI see.\nDo come visit again.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (007,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 19

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \bWelcome to the Expedition House!
 @>Text: \bYou can stay here and restore your Pokémon for a 
  :    : small fee.
 @>Text: \G\bBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
  @>Text: \bI'm sorry but you don't have enough money.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\bWould you like to rest your Pokémon?\nThe cost 
   :    : is $\v[3].
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \bAlright, see you next time.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \bWelcome to the Expedition House!
 @>Text: \bDo your Pokémon need to rest?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
  @>Screen Flash: (0,0,0,255), @60
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>Text: \bThere, all better! 
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bOkay, be safe!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 010
Event Name: Vending machine 2
(X,Y): (007,008)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Up
 @>Label: Start
 @>Text: It's a vending machine built into the wall!\n
 @>Show Choices: Fresh Water - $400, Coffee - $375, Cancel
 (When Cancel: Choice 3)
 : When [Fresh Water - $400]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 400 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:FRESHWATER)
    @>Change Gold: - 400
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:FRESHWATER)
    @>Text: \GA Fresh Water dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...20)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:FRESHWATER)
      @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:FRESHWATER)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Fresh Water dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Coffee - $375]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 375 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:COFFEE)
    @>Change Gold: - 375
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:COFFEE)
    @>Text: \GA Coffee dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...20)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:COFFEE)
      @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:COFFEE)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Coffee dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Cancel]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>

(X,Y): (013,032)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: Object rock

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Direction Fix
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:SHATTERHAMMER)
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbRockSmash
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Direction Fix OFF
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Turn Up
  @>Script: pbSmashThisEvent
  @>Script: Kernel.pbRockSmashRandomEncounter
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: This rock might be breakable with the right tool.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 004
Event Name: Mom
(X,Y): (009,009)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 28

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0007: Starter choice] == 0
 @>Text: \xn[Diana]Happy Birthday \PN!\n
  :    : Go talk to your Dad about your present.
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Variable 0007: Starter choice is 1 or above

Graphic: NPC 28

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \xn[Diana]\rOh did you need me to heal your 
 :    : Pokémon?
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
  @>Text: \rYou don't have enough money, it costs $\v[3], \PN.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\rIt will cost $\v[3]. Is that okay?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \xn[Diana]\rBe safe!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
  @>Screen Flash: (0,0,0,255), @60
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>Text: \xn[Diana]\rThere, all better!
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \xn[Diana]\rBe safe!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 016
Event Name: EV016
(X,Y): (028,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == OFF
 @>Text: A new Pokémon fan fiction is pulled up.
  :    : The Red Gyrados... better not read this now.
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>Show Choices: Access PC, Toggle Debug, Fix Stuck Timer, Toggle Special Game Modes
(When Cancel: Branch)
: When [Access PC]
 @>Script: pbTrainerPC
 @>
: When [Toggle Debug]
 @>Input Number: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice], 4 digit(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 2232
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $DEBUG
   @>Text: Debug set to FALSE.
   @>Script: $DEBUG = false
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: Debug set to TRUE.
   @>Script: $DEBUG = true
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Incorrect password.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Fix Stuck Timer]
 @>Control Timer: Stop
 @>
: When [Toggle Special Game Modes]
 @>Text: \ch[1,0,ADJUST NUZLOCKE RULES,ADJUST RANDOMIZER RULES,DISABLE NUZLOCKE,DISABLE RANDOMIZER,CANCEL]
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
  @>Script: EliteBattle.startNuzlocke
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 1
  @>Script: EliteBattle.startRandomizer
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 2
  @>Script: EliteBattle.resetNuzlocke
  @>Text: NUZLOCKE disabled.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 3
  @>Script: EliteBattle.resetRandomizer
  @>Text: RANDOMIZER disabled.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 4
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When Cancel
 @>Play SE: 'PC close', 80, 100
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 021

(X,Y): (008,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trchar99x

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]Today is the day \PN.\n
 :    : Happy 10th birthday!
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]You will choose your Pokémon.\n
 :    : I brought three for you to choose from from the lab.
@>Label: goback
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]I know you will make me proud \PN.
 :    : Choose wisely.
@>Show Choices: Meowth (Alolan), Solosis, Tyrogue
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Meowth (Alolan)]
 @>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]\l[4]So you want <b>MEOWTH?</b>\n
  :    : This is a special Pokemon.\n It's DARK type when 
  :    : they are normally NORMAL type.
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: pkmn = Pokemon.new(:MEOWTH, 5)
  :       : pkmn.form = 1           #Alolan
  :       : Pokemon#calc_stats
  @>Script: pbAddPokemon(pkmn)
  @>Control Variables: [0007: Starter choice] = 1
  @>Jump to Label: picked
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Jump to Label: goback
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Solosis]
 @>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]So you want <b>SOLOSIS?</b>\n
  :    : The Psychic type Pokémon.
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: pbAddPokemon(:SOLOSIS, 5)
  @>Control Variables: [0007: Starter choice] = 3
  @>Jump to Label: picked
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Jump to Label: goback
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [Tyrogue]
 @>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]So you want <b>TYROGUE?</b>\n
  :    : The Fighting type Pokémon.
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Script: pbAddPokemon(:TYROGUE, 5)
  @>Control Variables: [0007: Starter choice] = 2
  @>Jump to Label: picked
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Jump to Label: goback
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: picked
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0007: Starter choice] == 1
 @>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]Interesting choice.\n
  :    : <b>MEOWTH</b> is an excellent fit for you \PN.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0007: Starter choice] == 2
 @>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]Interesting choice.\n
  :    : <b>TYROGUE</b> is an excellent fit for you \PN.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0007: Starter choice] == 3
 @>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]Interesting choice.\n
  :    : <b>SOLOSIS</b> is an excellent fit for you \PN.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]\l[3]I am sure the two of you will grow 
 :    : together and 
 :    : become best friends.
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]I remember when I turned ten, such a 
 :    : celebration.
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]All young trainer's start their 
 :    : Pokémon journey at 
 :    : that age.
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]It serves as a personal pilgrimage 
 :    : to mature and 
 :    : see the world.
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]I know you will go far \PN. Visit me 
 :    : in Anthophil 
 :    : sometime wont you?
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Yew]Your mother and I pitched in and got 
 :    : you this 
 :    : Pokédex!

Move Animation

List of Event Commands:
@>Label: Start
@>Text: Choose a text option.
@>Show Choices: Colour and formatting, Showing extra things, Other, Cancel
(When Cancel: Choice 4)
: When [Colour and formatting]
 @>Text: \bThis is the text of a male character.
  :    : \rThis is the text of a female character.
 @>Text: \pgThis text is the colour of the player's gender. 
  :    : \pogThis text is the colour of the opposite gender to 
  :    : the player.
 @>Text: \c[0]Default, \c[1]blue, \c[2]red, \c[3]green, \c[4]cyan, 
  :    : \c[5]magenta, \c[6]yellow, \c[7]grey, \c[8]white, 
  :    : \c[9]purple, \c[10]orange, \c[11]dark, \c[12]light.
 @>Text: <b>Bold text,</b> <i>italic text,</i> <u>underlined 
  :    : text,</u> <s>strikethrough text,</s> <outln>outline 
  :    : text,</outln> <outln2>thicker outline text.</outln2>
 @>Text: <fn=Power Clear Bold>Power Clear Bold text,</fn> 
  :    : <fs=25>size 25 text,</fs> <fs=40>size 40 text,</fs> 
  :    : <o=128>half-transparent text.</o>
 @>Text: This is a line\n break. Text is \n<r>right-aligned until 
  :    : next line\n break. Text is <ac>centred</ac> here. 
  :    : Text is <ar>right-aligned</ar> here.
 @>Jump to Label: Start
 @>
: When [Showing extra things]
 @>Text: \PN is the player's name, \PM is the player's money, 
  :    : \v[12] is the content of Game Variable 12.
 @>Text: \GThe money window is shown.
 @>Text: \CNThe coins window is shown.
 @>Text: \G\CNThe money and coins windows are both 
  :    : shown. The coins window must be shown second.
 @>Text: \f[introBoy]The introBoy picture from the 
  :    : Graphics/Pictures folder is shown.
 @>Text: \ff[introBoy]The introBoy picture is shown again, but 
  :    : cropped to the top-left 96x96 pixels of it.
 @>Text: This is <icon=bagPocket3> bagPocket3 from the 
  :    : folder Graphics/Icons. Icons shown this 
  :    : way are not padded.
 @>Jump to Label: Start
 @>
: When [Other]
 @>Text: \w[signskin]The windowskin has changed to 
  :    : "signskin" here.
 @>Text: \l[3]This message box has 3 lines to it rather than 2, 
  :    : so more text can be shown at once. Lorem ipsum 
  :    : dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
 @>Text: \wuThis message box is at the top.
 @>Text: \wmThis message box is in the middle.
 @>Text: \wuThis message box is\wm jumping around the 
  :    : screen\wd in a rather off-putting way.
 @>Text: \opThis message box slides on-screen at the start.
 @>Text: \clThis message box slides off-screen at the end.
 @>Text: \ts[]This text appeared instantly!
 @>Text: \ts[5]This text is slow to appear.
 @>Text: \se[Pkmn move learnt]Sound effect "Pkmn move 
  :    : learnt" was played.
 @>Text: Music effect "Item get" will be played.
  :    : \me[Item get]
 @>Jump to Label: Start
 @>
: When [Cancel]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: A complete list of all message options is available on 
 :    : the wiki.
@>

Event ID: 029
Event Name: EV029
(X,Y): (026,010)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: BELLSPROUT

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.hasSeen?(:BELLSPROUT)
 @>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:BELLSPROUT)
 @>
: Else
 @>Play SE: 'Voltorb Flip level up', 100, 100
 @>Text: Bellsprout's information was recorded in the 
  :    : Pokédex.
 @>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:BELLSPROUT)
 @>Script: $Trainer.setSeen(:BELLSPROUT)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \xn[Bellsprout]Byoowampph.
@>Text: Bellsprout can pick all of the berries that are ready if 
 :    : you would like him to.
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: pbMassBerryPicker(1,28)
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 030
Event Name: Apricorn tree
(X,Y): (026,017)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: Object tree 2

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Direction Fix
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Gives 1 random Apricorn each time.
@>Comment: For demonstration purposes only - Apricorn trees 
 :       : should provide a fixed Apricorn, have a 24 hour delay 
 :       : (like Kurt does), and should look different to 
 :       : Headbutt trees.
@>Script: apricorns = [
:       :   :REDAPRICORN,
:       :   :YELLOWAPRICORN,
:       :   :BLUEAPRICORN,
:       :   :GREENAPRICORN,
:       :   :PINKAPRICORN,
:       :   :WHITEAPRICORN,
:       :   :BLACKAPRICORN
:       : ]
@>Script: random_item = apricorns.sample
:       : pbItemBall(random_item)
@>Script: pbSetEventTime
@>

Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Direction Fix
Trigger: Action Button

@>Text: The Apricorn has not regrown yet.
@>

Event ID: 008
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
  @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
   :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
   :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?\nThe cost 
   :    : is $\v[3].
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
  :       : for i in 1..count
  :       :   pbSet(6,i)
  :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
  :       :   pbWait(16)
  :       : end
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation ON
  @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
  @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
   @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
   @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
    :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
   @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
    :    : exceptionally well.
   @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
   @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
    :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 : When [Yes]

    :              : $>Turn Left

     :    : exceptionally well.

    @>
   : Else

     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
  :    : health.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion

 :       : :MAXPOTION,:FULLRESTORE,
 :       : :REVIVE,:ANTIDOTE,

 :       : :BURNHEAL,:ICEHEAL,
 :       : :FULLHEAL,:ESCAPEROPE,
 :       : :REPEL,:SUPERREPEL,:MAXREPEL
 :       : ])
 @>Exit Event Processing
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.numbadges>=7
 @>Script: pbPokemonMart([
 :       : :POKEBALL,:GREATBALL,
 :       : :ULTRABALL,:POTION,
 :       : :SUPERPOTION,:HYPERPOTION,

 :       : ])

@>Text: \xn[Brett]Oh hey \PN, how's it going?
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I see you have the <b>Granite Badge</b>!
 :    : Nicely done!
@>Text: \xn[Brett]You know I didn't want to take advantage of you
 :    : before when you were a newbie but now that
 :    : you've got two badges, we should be rivals!
@>Text: What do you say?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Yes]
 @>Jump to Label: a
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]Oh don't be scared, come on! It will just
  :    : be a bit of friendly competition.
 @>Jump to Label: a
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: a
@>Text: \xn[Brett]So, when we're rivals we're supposed to have
 :    : a battle to see who's the best at training their
 :    : Pokémon!
@>Script: EliteBattle.set(:nextBattleBack, :MOUNTAIN)
@>Script: EliteBattle.assign_bgm("Trainer_Battle_Kanto.ogg",:POKEMONTRAINER_Brett,1)
@>Script: EliteBattle.set(:nextBattleScript, :BRETT1)
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:POKEMONTRAINER_Brett,"Brett",_I("Great fight!"),false,1,0,1)
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]Well fought!\nI think you've come a long way!
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]I wanted to give you this and tell you that
  :    : the Seafoam Cave has been opened up again!
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]Well fought!\nI think you've come a long way!
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]I wanted to give you this and tell you that
  :    : the Seafoam Cave has been opened up again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:MAXREPEL)
@>Text: \xn[Brett]I think you're gonna need it for getting through 
 :    : Seafoam Cave!
@>Text: \xn[Brett]Your dad, Professor Yew in Anthrophil wants to see 
 :    : you by the way.
@>Text: \xn[Brett]By the way if you don't have a town map, I brought 
 :    : an extra with me just incase.
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:TOWNMAP)
 @>Text: \xn[Brett]Oh you've already got one! Great!
 @>
: Else
 @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:TOWNMAP)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \xn[Brett]See ya later!
@>Set Move Route: [Rival]
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Jump: -2,+1
 :              : $>SE: 'Player jump', 80, 100

                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left

Event ID: 005
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
  @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
   :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
   :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?\nThe cost 
   :    : is $\v[3].
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
  :       : for i in 1..count
  :       :   pbSet(6,i)
  :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
  :       :   pbWait(16)
  :       : end
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation ON
  @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
  @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
   @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
   @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
    :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
   @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
    :    : exceptionally well.
   @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
   @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
    :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0

    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
  @>
 : Branch End

 @>
: Else

  :    : health.

 @>Set Move Route: This event

Event ID: 003
Event Name: Questionnaire
(X,Y): (001,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.mysterygiftaccess
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: There is a questionnaire.\nWould you like to fill it out?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \PN filled in the questionnaire.
  @>Set Move Route: [Mart]
   :              : $>Turn Down
  @>Script: pbExclaim(get_character(2))
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>Text: \bOh, hello!\nYou filled in the questionnaire?
  @>Text: \bThat means you must know about the Mystery Gift.
  @>Text: \bFrom now on, you should be receiving Mystery 
   :    : Gifts!
  @>Script: $Trainer.mysterygiftaccess=true
  @>Text: \w[signskin]Once you save your game, you can 
   :    : access the Mystery Gift.
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>

 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Move Left

 @>Text: Now it's our turn, get him!
 @>

 @>

  :    : still control the power!

  :              : $>Through ON

Event ID: 012
Event Name: EV012
(X,Y): (004,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 26

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rI'm looking for a <b>GEODUDE.</b> Do you 
 :    : want to trade me for my <b>VULPIX</b>.
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Comment: The chosen Pokémon's party index goes in game 
  :       : variable 1. A value of -1 means no Pokémon was 
  :       : chosen.
  :       : The chosen Pokémon's name goes in game variable 2.
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemonForTrade(1,2,:GEODUDE)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == -1
  @>Text: \rI'll be here if you change your mind.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rOK, let's get started.
  @>Script: pbStartTrade(pbGet(1),
  :       :    :VULPIX,"Cinder","Emily")
  @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
  :       : pkmn.iv[0]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[1]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[2]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[3]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[4]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[5]=25
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:FIRESPIN)
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:BATONPASS)
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:TACKLE)
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:EMBER)
  @>Script: pkmn.calcStats
  @>Text: \PN traded Geodude for Vulpix!
  @>Text: \rThanks, take good care of Cinder.
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rYou don't want to trade? Aww...
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 014

(X,Y): (011,059)

Page #1
Conditions

Graphic: trchar014

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \bUh...\nOh, yes, I'm the Move Deleter.
@>Text: \bI can make Pokémon forget their moves.
@>Text: \bWould you like me to do that?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: ChoosePokemon
 @>Text: \bWhich Pokémon should forget a move?
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1,3)
 @>Comment: If variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has 
  :       : canceled choosing a Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
   :    : forgotten.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isEgg?
   @>Text: \bWhat? No Egg should know any moves.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: (pbGetPokemon(1).isShadow? rescue false)
   @>Text: \bWhat? I can't make a Shadow Pokémon forget a 
    :    : move.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).numMoves==1
   @>Text: \b\v[3] seems to know only one move...
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \bWhich move should be forgotten?
  @>Script: pbChooseMove(pbGetPokemon(1),2,4)
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] < 0
   @>Jump to Label: ChoosePokemon
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \bHm! \v[3]'s \v[4]? That move should be forgotten?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Play ME: '013-Gag02', 100, 100
    @>Wait: 80 frame(s)
    @>Script: pbGetPokemon(1).pbDeleteMoveAtIndex(
    :       :    pbGet(2))
    @>Text: \bIt worked to perfection!
    @>Text: \b\v[3] has forgotten \v[4] completely.
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
     :    : forgotten.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bCome again if there are moves that need to be 
  :    : forgotten.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 :    : to steal Pokémon, and the Cardino region is no 
 :    : exception.
@>Text: \xn[Daniel]\l[3]They've gathered up all of the powerful Pokémon 
 :    : in Cardino and have sequestered them away in
 :    : a secret hideout.
@>Text: \xn[Daniel]\l[3]I believe that they are attempting to amass
 :    : an army with these Pokémon. Maybe I'm speculating 
 :    : too much but, let me ask you.
@>Text: \xn[Daniel]Have you heard of the Pokémon known as Mew?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \xn[Daniel]\l[3]I expected as much, you are Professor Yew's
  :    : child afterall. 
 @>Jump to Label: a
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \xn[Daniel]\l[3]Mew is an ancient and powerful Pokémon.
 @>Label: a
 @>Text: \xn[Daniel]\l[3]Mew's DNA is supposed to contain a sequence 
  :    : for every known Pokémon.
 @>Text: \xn[Daniel]\l[3]Mew has been reportedly sighted in the Cardino 
  :    : region and I believe Rocket is trying to capture it to 
  :    : use it's DNA.
 @>Text: \xn[Daniel]\l[3]Team Rocket is forcing Pokémon to evolve beyond 
  :    : their limits by manipulating a process called Mega 
  :    : Evolution.
 @>Text: \xn[Daniel]\l[3]Normally Mega Evolution is stressful, but not 
  :    : permanent for a Pokémon, but somehow they're 
  :    : tweaking this formula.
 @>Text: \xn[Daniel]\l[3]I fear they're trying to capture Mew to use it's 
  :    : DNA to force evolve Pokémon into something beyond 
  :    : Mega evolution.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \xn[Daniel]Be careful!
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled

(X,Y): (024,085)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: Object tree 1

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Direction Fix
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:CLIPPERS)
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbCut
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Direction Fix OFF
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Turn Up
  @>Script: pbSmashThisEvent
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: This tree looks like it can be cut with an appropriate 
  :    : item.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 11

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: I opened this house up years ago to help
 :    : trainers on their way to the city.
 :    : Do you need to rest?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Screen Flash: (0,0,0,255), @60
 @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
 @>Text: There, all better!
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: Okay, be safe!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trchar043

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \bI'm looking for a <b>DIGLETT</b>? Do you 
 :    : want to trade me for my <b>STARYU</b>?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Comment: The chosen Pokémon's party index goes in game 
  :       : variable 1. A value of -1 means no Pokémon was 
  :       : chosen.
  :       : The chosen Pokémon's name goes in game variable 2.
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemonForTrade(1,2,:DIGLETT)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == -1
  @>Text: \bI'll be here if you change your mind.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \bOK, let's get started.
  @>Script: pbStartTrade(pbGet(1),
  :       :    :STARYU,"Max","Erick")
  @>Text: \PN traded Diglett for Staryu!
  @>Text: \bThanks! Take good care of Max!
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bYou don't want to trade? Aww...
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 002
Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (002,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 07

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \bI'm part of a new expeditionary Pokémon medicine 
  :    : team. It's called Nurses without borders.
 @>Text: \bYou can stay here and restore your Pokémon for a 
  :    : small fee.
 @>Text: \G\bBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
  @>Text: \bI'm sorry but I can't heal your Pokémon 
   :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
   :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\bWould you like to rest your Pokémon?\nThe cost 
   :    : is $\v[3].
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \bAlright, see you next time.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \bI'm part of a new expeditionary Pokémon medicine 
  :    : team. It's called Nurses without borders.
 @>Text: \bDo your Pokémon need to rest?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
  @>Screen Flash: (0,0,0,255), @60
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>Text: \bThere, all better!
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \bOkay, be safe!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 005
Event Name: EV005
(X,Y): (002,005)

Page #1
Conditions

Graphic: trchar009

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \bI'm looking for a <b>FEAROW</b>? Do you 
 :    : want to trade me for my <b>FARFETCH'D</b>?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Comment: The chosen Pokémon's party index goes in game 
  :       : variable 1. A value of -1 means no Pokémon was 
  :       : chosen.
  :       : The chosen Pokémon's name goes in game variable 2.
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemonForTrade(1,2,:FEAROW)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == -1
  @>Text: \bI'll be here if you change your mind.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \bOK, let's get started.
  @>Script: pbStartTrade(pbGet(1),
  :       :    :FARFETCHD,"Leeky","Hawk")
  @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
  :       : pkmn.setItem(:STICK)
  :       : pkmn.iv[0]=30
  :       : pkmn.iv[1]=30
  :       : pkmn.iv[2]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[3]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[4]=10
  :       : pkmn.iv[5]=25
  :       : pkmn.level=26
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:RAZORLEAF)
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:SLASH)
  @>Script: pkmn.pbLearnMove(:AERIALACE)
  :       : pkmn.calcStats
  @>Text: \PN traded <b>FEAROW</b> for <b>
   :    : FARFETCH'D</b>!
  @>Text: \bTake good care of Leeky!
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bYou don't want to trade? Aww...
 @>
: Branch End
@>
