Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
  @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
   :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
   :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?\nThe cost 
   :    : is $\v[3].
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
  :       : for i in 1..count
  :       :   pbSet(6,i)
  :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
  :       :   pbWait(16)
  :       : end
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation ON
  @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
  @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
   @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
   @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
    :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
   @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
    :    : exceptionally well.
   @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
   @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
    :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pkmn = $Trainer.first_pokemon
 :       : pkmn.hp = 1
 @>Text: \rWe managed to bring your first Pokémon back with 
  :    : low HP. Do you want to fully heal your party?
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
    :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
  :    : health.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: for i in 1..$Trainer.pokemonCount
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
  :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 : When [Yes]

   :    : Gifts!

   :    : access the Mystery Gift.

None

Graphic: NPC 07

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \G\CN\bWelcome to Rocket Game Corner!
@>Conditional Branch: Script: !$PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:COINCASE)
 @>Text: \G\CN\bDo you need some game coins?\nWould you 
  :    : like to buy some?
 @>Text: \G\CN\bYou don't have a Coin Case.
 @>
: Else
 @>Label: Start menu
 @>Text: \G\CN\bDo you need some game coins?\nWould you 
  :    : like to buy some?
 @>Show Choices: 50 coins [$1,000], 500 coins [$10,000], Exit
 (When Cancel: Choice 3)
 : When [50 coins [$1,000]]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.coins + 50 >= Settings::MAX_COINS
   @>Text: \G\CN\bWhoops!\nYour Coin Case is full.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 999 or less
    @>Text: \G\CN\bYou can't afford the coins.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Change Gold: - 1000
    @>Script: $Trainer.coins += 50
    @>Text: \G\CN\bThank you\nHere are your coins!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [500 coins [$10,000]]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.coins + 500 >= Settings::MAX_COINS
   @>Text: \G\CN\bWhoops!\nYour Coin Case is full.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Gold 9999 or less
    @>Text: \G\CN\bYou can't afford the coins.
    @>
   : Else
    @>Change Gold: - 10000
    @>Script: $Trainer.coins += 500
    @>Text: \G\CN\bThank you\nHere are your coins!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Exit]
  @>Text: \G\CN\bNo?\nPlease come play sometime!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Jump to Label: Start menu
@>

:       :   data = GameData::Item.get(item)
:       :   pbSet(3, data.name)

   @>

    @>Script: $Trainer.coins -= pbGet(2)
    @>Script: pbReceiveItem(pbGet(1))
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \CN\bYou have no room in your Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>

:       : price = [4000, 3500, 4000,
:       :          4500, 4000, 0][pbGet(1)]
@>Script: pbSet(1, item)
:       : pbSet(2, price)
:       : if item
:       :   data = GameData::Item.get(item)
:       :   pbSet(3, data.name)
:       : end
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0002: Temp Move Choice] > 0
 @>Text: \CN\bSo, you want the \v[3]?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(2) > $Trainer.coins
   @>Text: \CN\bSorry, you'll need more coins than that.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(pbGet(1))
    @>Script: $Trainer.coins -= pbGet(2)
    @>Script: pbReceiveItem(pbGet(1))
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \CN\bYou have no room in your Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

:       : :PROTEIN,
:       : :IRON,
:       : :CALCIUM,
:       : :ZINC,
:       : :CARBOS
:       : ])
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 008
Event Name: Vending machine 2
(X,Y): (012,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Up
 @>Label: Start
 @>Text: It's a vending machine.\n
  :    : Which drink would you like?\G
 @>Show Choices: Fresh Water - $400, Soda Pop - $480, Lemonade - $640, Cancel
 (When Cancel: Choice 4)
 : When [Fresh Water - $400]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 400 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:FRESHWATER)
    @>Change Gold: - 400
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:FRESHWATER)
    @>Text: \GA Fresh Water dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...20)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:FRESHWATER)
      @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:FRESHWATER)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Fresh Water dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Soda Pop - $480]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 480 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:SODAPOP)
    @>Change Gold: - 480
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:SODAPOP)
    @>Text: \GA Soda Pop dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...25)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:SODAPOP)
      @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:SODAPOP)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Soda Pop dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Lemonade - $640]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 640 or more
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:LEMONADE)
    @>Change Gold: - 640
    @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:LEMONADE)
    @>Text: \GA Lemonade dropped down!
    @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = Random No. (0...30)
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
     @>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbCanStore?(:LEMONADE)
      @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbStoreItem(:LEMONADE)
      @>Text: \GBonus! Another Lemonade dropped down.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Jump to Label: Start
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \GYou have no room left in the Bag.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \GYou don't have enough money.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Cancel]
  @>Text: \GDecided not to buy a drink.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else

: Branch End

Graphic: doors9

Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled

@>Set Move Route: This event
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>SE: 'Door enter', 100, 100
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Up
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion

                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Through ON
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Through OFF
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Change Transparent Flag: Transparency
@>Set Move Route: This event
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Change Transparent Flag: Normal
@>Transfer Player:[113: Anthophil Elevator], (002,005), Up, No Fade
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

 :    : nefarious scheme Team Rocket has in

@>Text: however scientists\nassured us that there were no possible
 :    : strains of Pokémon DNA left within these
 :    : fossils,
@>Text: and reproduction of these ancient
 :    : Pokémon would be near impossible.

 :    : was assosciated with the terrible Pokémon 
 :    : known as Mewtwo, however Dr.

 :    : experts confirmed that Team Rocket 
 :    : has no access to cloning equipment after
@>Text: siezing Dr. Fuji's laboratory earlier this morning.

 :    : that Giovanni, the Kingpin of Rocket, is
 :    : still at large,

List of Event Commands:
@>Change Text Options: Bottom, Show
@>Prepare for Transition
@>Play BGM: 'Introduction', 100, 100
@>Show Picture: 1, 'introbg', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Execute Transition
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 2, 'introbase', Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introOak', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 2, @15, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @15, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Text: \bHello! It's good you've arrived!
@>Text: \bWelcome to Pokémon Alexandrite.
@>Text: \bMy name is Professor Yew.
@>Label: Help Choices
@>Text: \bDo you need any help?
@>Show Choices: No information needed., See controls
(When Cancel: Choice 1)
: When [No information needed.]
 @>Text: \bWell then, without further ado...
 @>
: When [See controls]
 @>Script: pbEventScreen(ButtonEventScene)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: gamemodes
@>Text: \l[3]Enable special gamemodes?\1\n
 :    : You can toggle these modes at a later time at your 
 :    : home PC.
@>Show Choices: Continue, Toggle Game Modes
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Continue]
 @>
: When [Toggle Game Modes]
 @>Show Choices: NUZLOCKE, RANDOMIZER, DONE
 (When Cancel: Choice 3)
 : When [NUZLOCKE]
  @>Script: EliteBattle.startNuzlocke
  @>Jump to Label: gamemodes
  @>
 : When [RANDOMIZER]
  @>Script: EliteBattle.startRandomizer
  @>Jump to Label: gamemodes
  @>
 : When [DONE]
  @>Jump to Label: gamemodes
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: difficulty
@>Text: \l[3]Do you want to change the game difficulty?
 :    : \1This can always be swapped later from the options 
 :    : menu.
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \l[2]Select each mode to learn more about it.
 @>Show Choices: Normal, Hard Mode, Nintendo Mode, Challenge Mode
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Normal]
  @>Text: \ts[]\l[4]Normal mode forces the SET battle style and 
   :    : allows no more than 4 items per trainer battle.
  @>Show Choices: Go Back, Choose Normal Mode
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Go Back]
   @>Jump to Label: difficulty
   @>
  : When [Choose Normal Mode]
   @>Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty = 1
   @>Jump to Label: Intro2
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Hard Mode]
  @>Text: \ts[]\l[6]Hard mode forces the SET battle style and allows no more than 3 items per trainer battle. In addition, you will have a level cap which is based on the number 
   :    : of 
   :    : gym badges you have, and is always 1 level lower than the current Gym.
  @>Show Choices: Go Back, Choose Hard Mode
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Go Back]
   @>Jump to Label: difficulty
   @>
  : When [Choose Hard Mode]
   @>Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty = 2
   @>Jump to Label: Intro2
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Nintendo Mode]
  @>Text: \l[2]Nintendo Mode offers no restrictions and plays like a vanilla game.
  @>Show Choices: Go Back, Choose Nintendo Mode
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Go Back]
   @>Jump to Label: difficulty
   @>
  : When [Choose Nintendo Mode]
   @>Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty = 0
   @>Jump to Label: Intro2
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [Challenge Mode]
  @>Text: \ts[]\l[8]Challenge mode uses SET battle style and 2 items per trainer battle. You will have a level cap  based on the 
   :    : number of badges you have, 1 level lower than the current Gym. Finally, Pokémon Centers will cost you money based on your party's levels. 
   :    : It is possible to become soft-locked if you run out of money/options.
  @>Show Choices: Go Back, Choose Challenge Mode
  (When Cancel: Disallow)
  : When [Go Back]
   @>Jump to Label: difficulty
   @>
  : When [Choose Challenge Mode]
   @>Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty = 3
   @>Jump to Label: Intro2
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Jump to Label: Intro2
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: Intro2
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introPonyta', Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Text: \l[3]\bThanks for downloading this demo!\n
 :    : Keep in mind it's a beta, so you should\n
 :    : save often!
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introOak', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Text: \bLet's get started!
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 2, @10, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Wait: 15 frame(s)
@>Label: Gender
@>Text: \bAre you a boy or a girl?
@>Show Choices: Boy, Girl
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Boy]
 @>Comment: Initializes player 0 (PlayerA).
  :       : ["pbChangePlayer" takes a value from 0 through 7; 
  :       : other values are not valid. To edit information about 
  :       : a player, choose "Set Metadata" in the Pokemon 
  :       : Essentials Editor and select "Global".]
 @>Show Picture: 3, 'introBoy', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>Control Switches: [0073: BOY] = ON
 @>Script: pbChangePlayer(0)
 @>
: When [Girl]
 @>Comment: initializes player 1 (PlayerB)
 @>Show Picture: 3, 'introGirl', Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>Script: pbChangePlayer(1)
 @>
: Branch End
@>Move Picture: 2, @10, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,178), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0073: BOY] == ON
 @>Text: So you're a boy?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Control Switches: [0073: BOY] = OFF
  @>Jump to Label: Gender
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: So you're a girl then?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Control Switches: [0073: BOY] = OFF
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Jump to Label: Gender
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \bNow what did you say your name was?
@>Label: Enter Name
@>Comment: Opens the name entry screen and initializes the 
 :       : trainer object
@>Script: pbTrainerName
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Text: \bSo you're \PN?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \bWhat is your name?
 @>Jump to Label: Enter Name
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \b\PN, are you ready?
@>Text: \bYour very own Pokémon story is about to unfold.
@>Fade Out BGM: 4 sec.
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Transfer Player:[032: \PN's House], (029,007), Left
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>

Event ID: 008
Event Name: Fossil reviver
(X,Y): (018,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trainer_SCIENTIST

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0113: FossilsActive] == OFF
 @>Text: \bHi \PN, we're still getting the equipment set up.
  :    : Soon we should be able to revive fossils though.
 @>Text: \bI'll ask your dad to call you when it's ready ok?
 @>Exit Event Processing
 @>
: Branch End
@>Comment: The fossil reviver finishes reviving the Pokémon as 
 :       : soon as you step out of the door. See the exit event 
 :       : on this map.
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch B == OFF
 @>Text: \bOh, good you're here!
 @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \bAiyah! You come again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \bDo you have a fossil for me?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \bWhich fossil do you want me to revive?
 @>Script: pbChooseFossil(9)
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(9) == :NONE
  @>Comment: Player didn't choose a fossil.
  @>Text: \bLet me know when you want me to revive a 
   :    : fossil for you.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Comment: Player chose a fossil.
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(pbGet(9))
  @>Script: data = GameData::Item.get(pbGet(9))
  :       : pbSet(3, data.name)
  @>Text: \bOkay. I'll see if I can revive your \v[3].
  @>Text: \bCome back later.
  @>Comment: Convert fossil into species now.
  @>Script: conversion_hash = {
  :       :   :HELIXFOSSIL => :OMANYTE,
  :       :   :DOMEFOSSIL  => :KABUTO,
  :       :   :OLDAMBER    => :AERODACTYL,
  :       :   :ROOTFOSSIL  => :LILEEP,
  :       :   :CLAWFOSSIL  => :ANORITH,
  :       :   :SKULLFOSSIL => :CRANIDOS,
  :       :   :ARMORFOSSIL => :SHIELDON
  :       : }
  @>Script: conversion_hash.merge!({
  :       :   :COVERFOSSIL => :TIRTOUGA,
  :       :   :PLUMEFOSSIL => :ARCHEN,
  :       :   :JAWFOSSIL   => :TYRUNT,
  :       :   :SAILFOSSIL  => :AMAURA
  :       : })
  @>Script: item = pbGet(9)
  :       : species = conversion_hash[item]
  :       : pbSet(9, species)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Comment: Player doesn't want to choose a fossil.
 @>Text: \bI'll be here if you want my help.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Conditions

 :    : Pokémon.

   :    : special move?

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Triple Triad explainer
(X,Y): (004,005)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 08

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rI'm here to explain the rules of Triple Triad.
@>Label: Choices
@>Text: \rWhich topic do you want to learn about?
@>Show Choices: Basics, Game rules, Prizes, Exit
(When Cancel: Choice 4)
: When [Basics]
 @>Text: \rTriple Triad is a game played with special square 
  :    : cards placed on a 3x3 board.
 @>Text: \rEach card has 4 numbers on it, one per side.  
  :    : These numbers are so-called stats.
 @>Text: \rPlayers take turns placing cards on the board. As 
  :    : they do so, they try to capture and gain control of 
  :    : their opponent's cards.
 @>Text: \rThat's where the numbers come in. If a player 
  :    : places a card with a higher number next to a card 
  :    : with a lower number, the player captures that card.
 @>Text: \rThus, the goal of the game is to gain control of more 
  :    : cards than the other player by the end of the game.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Game rules]
 @>Text: \rThere are a number of optional game rules you can 
  :    : apply to individual games.
 @>Text: \rThey can affect card stats, how cards capture 
  :    : each other, the scoring and the prizes.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Prizes]
 @>Text: \rWhen you win a game, you will recive 1 random 
  :    : card from your opponent from their Deck.
 @>Text: \rThis also works the other way around: if you lose, 
  :    : you have to give your opponent one of your cards, 
  :    : chosen at random.
 @>Text: \rYou can change what you win or lose from a game 
  :    : by using an optional game rule.
 @>Jump to Label: Choices
 @>
: When [Exit]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 002
Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (009,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 08

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rOh thank goodness you're here!\n
 :    : My Eevee is so upset, you see it really wants
 :    : a <b>TAMATOBERRY</b>.
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:TAMATOBERRY)
 @>Text: \rOh you've got a <b>TAMATOBERRY</b>!
  :    : Can you give it to Eevee?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \PN gave the <b>TAMATOBERRY</b> to
   :    : Eevee!
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(:TAMATOBERRY)
  @>Play SE: '133Cry', 80, 100
  @>Text: The Pokémon ate the berry and seems happy!
  @>Text: \rOh dear it seems like the Eevee want's
   :    : another type of berry.

 :    : allegedly fleeing the scene after breaking
 :    : and entering the Emberton museum of
 :    : Pokémon history.
@>Text: The suspects have reportedly stolen
 :    : numerous priceless fossils related to
 :    : ancient Pokémon which are now 
 :    : conisdered extict in the wild.
@>Text: We can only speculate as to what
 :    : nefarious scheme Team Rocket has in
 :    : store for these fossils,
@>Text: however scientists\nassured us that there were no possible
 :    : strains of Pokémon DNA left within these
 :    : fossils,
@>Text: and reproduction of these ancient
 :    : Pokémon would be near impossible.
@>Text: We do know that in the past Team Rocket
 :    : was assosciated with the terrible Pokémon 
 :    : known as Mewtwo, however Dr.
@>Text: Fuji is currently custody and police
 :    : experts confirmed that Team Rocket 
 :    : has no access to cloning equipment after
@>Text: siezing Dr. Fuji's laboratory earlier this morning.
@>Text: Police would like to remind all viewers
 :    : that Giovanni, the Kingpin of Rocket, is
 :    : still at large,
@>Text: anyone with information 
 :    : about the whereabouts of the fossils

 :    : Tip hotline at 999-666-333.

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 023
Event Name: Day Care Man
(X,Y): (031,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 18

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbEggGenerated?
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bAh, it's you!
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bWe were raising your Pokémon, and my goodness, 
  :    : were we surprised!
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bYour Pokémon was holding an Egg!
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bWe don't know how it got there, but your Pokémon 
  :    : had it.
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bYou do want it, don't you?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Label: ReceiveEgg
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.party_full?
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bYou have no room for it right now... Come back 
    :    : when you've made room.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\me[Egg get]\PN received the Egg from the Day-Care 
   :    : Man.
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bYou take good care of it.
  @>Script: pbDayCareGenerateEgg
  @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg = 0
  :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps = 0
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bI really will keep it. You do want this Egg, yes?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Jump to Label: ReceiveEgg
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bWell all right then, I'll take it. Thank you.
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bThat is, I don't think we'll ever find another...
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bNo, no, I'm sure we'll find another one. I'm definitely 
    :    : sure of it!
   @>Script: $PokemonGlobal.daycareEgg = 0
   :       : $PokemonGlobal.daycareEggSteps = 0
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited == 0
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bI'm the Day-Care Man.
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bI help take care of the precious Pokémon of 
   :    : trainers.
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bAny Pokémon you'd like to have raised you can 
   :    : leave in my daughter's care.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited == 1
  @>Script: pbDayCareGetDeposited(-1, 3, -1)
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bAh, it's you!\nGood to see you!
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bYour \v[3] is doing just fine.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited == 2
  @>Script: pbDayCareGetDeposited(0, 3, -1)
  :       : pbDayCareGetDeposited(1, 4, -1)
  :       : pbDayCareGetCompatibility(5)
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bAh, it's you!\nGood to see you!
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bYour \v[3] and \v[4] are doing just fine.
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 0
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bThe two play with other Pokémon rather than with 
    :    : each other...
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 1
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bThe two don't seem to like each other much.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 2
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bThe two seem to get along.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 3
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Man]\bThe two seem to get along very well.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Move Route: This event
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>SE: 'Door enter', 100, 100
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Left

(X,Y): (029,013)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 07

Autonomous Movement
Type: Random
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Isn't it great that we don't have to teach hidden 
 :    : machine moves to our Pokémon anymore? I love my 
 :    : <b>Clippers</b>.
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonBag.pbHasItem?(:CLIPPERS)
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: Oh you don't have <b>Clippers</b>?\n
  :    : The cut-master on route 104 can probably give you a 
  :    : pair!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

None

Graphic: trchar054

Autonomous Movement
Type: Random
Speed: 4: Fast
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: My favorite Pokémon is Hoppip!\n
 :    : Can you show me one?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbHasSpecies?(:HOPPIP)
  @>Text: Oh, you have Hoppip!
  @>Script: Kernel.pbReceiveItem(:SOOTHEBELL)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Hey you don't have a Hoppip!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 008
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
  @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
   :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
   :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?\nThe cost 
   :    : is $\v[3].
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
  :       : for i in 1..count
  :       :   pbSet(6,i)
  :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
  :       :   pbWait(16)
  :       : end
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation ON
  @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
  @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
   @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
   @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
    :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
   @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
    :    : exceptionally well.
   @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
   @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
    :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pkmn = $Trainer.first_pokemon
 :       : pkmn.hp = 1
 @>Text: \rWe managed to bring your first Pokémon back with 
  :    : low HP. Do you want to fully heal your party?
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
    :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
  :    : health.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: for i in 1..$Trainer.pokemonCount
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
  :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
  :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#==============================================================================
Map ID: 127
Map Name: Kurt's House
Tileset: 003: Inside
Width: 20, Height: 15

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Kurt
(X,Y): (012,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 18

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch C == OFF
 @>Text: \bHello! I'm Kurt!
 @>Text: \bI specialise in turning Apricorns into Poké Balls.
 @>Text: \bIf you like, I can convert one of yours into a Poké 
  :    : Ball.
 @>Control Self Switch: C =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \bHello again.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \bDo you have an Apricorn for me?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \bWhich Apricorn would you like me to convert?
 @>Script: pbChooseApricorn(8)
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(8) == :NONE
  @>Comment: Player didn't choose an Apricorn.
  @>Text: \bLet me know when you want me to convert an 
   :    : Apricorn for you.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Comment: Player chose an Apricorn.
  @>Script: $PokemonBag.pbDeleteItem(pbGet(8))
  @>Script: data = GameData::Item.get(pbGet(8))
  :       : pbSet(3, data.name)
  @>Text: \bOkay. I'll turn your \v[3] into a Poké Ball for you.
  @>Text: \bI should be finished by tomorrow.
  @>Comment: Convert Apricorn into Ball now.
  @>Script: conversion_hash = {
  :       :   :REDAPRICORN    => :LEVELBALL,
  :       :   :YELLOWAPRICORN => :MOONBALL,
  :       :   :BLUEAPRICORN   => :LUREBALL,
  :       :   :GREENAPRICORN  => :FRIENDBALL,
  :       :   :PINKAPRICORN   => :LOVEBALL,
  :       :   :WHITEAPRICORN  => :FASTBALL,
  :       :   :BLACKAPRICORN  => :HEAVYBALL
  :       : }
  @>Script: conversion_hash.merge!({
  :       :   :YLWAPRICORN => :MOONBALL,
  :       :   :BLUAPRICORN => :LUREBALL,
  :       :   :GRNAPRICORN => :FRIENDBALL,
  :       :   :PNKAPRICORN => :LOVEBALL,
  :       :   :WHTAPRICORN => :FASTBALL,
  :       :   :BLKAPRICORN => :HEAVYBALL
  :       : })
  @>Script: item = pbGet(8)
  :       : new_item = conversion_hash[item]
  :       : pbSet(8, new_item)
  @>Script: pbSetEventTime
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Comment: Player doesn't want to choose an Apricorn.
 @>Text: \bCome back when you have an Apricorn for me.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions

 : Else

   :    : me.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Comment: This only happens when Kurt is given an item that 
  :       : couldn't be turned into a Poké Ball on page 1.

  :       : mistake in the conversion_hash on page 1, namely 
  :       : that it doesn't contain an "apricorn => Poké Ball" pair 
  :       : for the item given to Kurt.

  :    : but it didn't work.

Autonomous Movement

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled

 :    : Are you interested in purchasing a Ponyta?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Alright, the price is $1000.
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 1000 or more
   @>Text: Thank you, please take good care of your Ponyta!
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbAddPokemon(:PONYTA,15)
    @>Change Gold: - 1000
    @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rOh, you don't have any space, please return once 
     :    : you have made room.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: Oh you don't have enough money!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: Have a nice day!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: Have a nice day!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 @>Script: pbSet(47,pbGetPokemon(1).iv[2])
 @>Script: pbSet(48,pbGetPokemon(1).iv[3])
 @>Script: pbSet(49,pbGetPokemon(1).iv[4])
 @>Script: pbSet(50,pbGetPokemon(1).iv[5])
 @>Text: \l[6]HP   \v[45]:31 \nATK \v[46]:31 \nDEF \v[47]:31 \nSPD \v[48]:31 \nSAT \v[49]:31 \nSDF \v[50]:31

  @>

 @>

@>Label: done

Event ID: 008
Event Name: EV008
(X,Y): (009,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Left
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0096: PokeTrainerMember] == ON
 @>Text: Thank you for your membership!
 @>Text: Would you like to purchase a pass for the EV training 
  :    : zone? The cost is $500 per 5 minutes for members.
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: Hello trainer, welcome the the Pokémon Training Club.
 @>Text: Would you like to purchase a pass for the EV training 
  :    : zone? The cost is $1000 per 5 minutes.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: A
@>Show Choices: No, Yes, More Information
(When Cancel: Choice 1)
: When [No]
 @>Text: We hope to see you again.
 @>Set Move Route: Player
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Turn Down
  :              : $>Move Down
 @>
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Excellent, I will take the payment then.
  :    : Good-luck!
 @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0096: PokeTrainerMember] == ON
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 499 or less
   @>Text: Oh uh, you seem to be a little short on funds.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Change Gold: - 500
   @>Jump to Label: B
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 999 or less
   @>Text: Oh uh, you seem to be a little short on funds.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Change Gold: - 1000
   @>Jump to Label: B
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Label: B
 @>Control Switches: [0099: EVTRAINING] = ON
 @>Control Switches: [0100: RESERVE(LEVELSCALE)] = ON
 @>Set Move Route: Player
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Turn Up
  :              : $>Move Up
  :              : $>Move Up
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Timer: Startup (5 min. 0 sec.)
 @>Transfer Player:[146: PKMN Training Field], (009,009)
 @>
: When [More Information]
 @>Text: The EV training zone is useful for powering up your 
  :    : Pokémon. 
 @>Text: \l[3]Each Pokémon has a maximum potential of 512 EV's 
  :    : and a maximum of 252 in one stat.
 @>Text: \l[3]4 EV's translates to an increase of 1 point in a 
  :    : particular stat. So the ideal number is 252 EV's per 
  :    : stat.
 @>Text: \l[3]Once you enter the training zone you will have five 
  :    : minutes to participate in battles against Pokémon.
 @>Text: \l[3]Each type of Pokémon translates to a particular EV 
  :    : that you will gain, for instance fighting Pidgey adds 
  :    : one point of speed EV.
 @>Text: \l[3]Once your time expires you must purchase another 
  :    : pass.
 @>Text: \l[3]It is worth nothing that the Pokémon in the zone will 
  :    : scale based on the average level of your party!
 @>Text: \l[3]Also your time spend inside of battles is not counted. 
  :    : We're not cheapskates!
 @>Jump to Label: A
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled

List of Event Commands:

@>Show Choices: Info, Continue
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Info]
 @>Text: \l[4]This system will set a Pokemon's IV to 31 for $50000 per IV.
  :    : It does not detect if an IV is already perfect so please use it carefully.
 @>Label: Analyze
 @>
: When [Continue]
 @>Label: Analyze
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: Analyze
@>Text: Select a Pokémon to modify.
@>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1,3)
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
 @>Jump to Label: done
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \ch[5,0,HP,ATTACK,DEFENSE,SPEED,SP.ATTACK,SP.DEFENSE]
  :    : Boost which IV for \v[3]?
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] == 0
  @>Conditional Branch: Gold 49999 or less
   @>Text: Inadequate funds.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Script: pkmn = pbGetPokemon(1)
   :       : pkmn.iv[0]=31
   :       : pkmn.calcStats
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Change Gold: - 50000
   @>Text: \v[3] got a perfect HP IV!

   @>Label: Analyze
   @>

  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End

   @>

 : Branch End

@>Text: \xn[Eve]\rAre you from around here?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No

: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \xn[Eve]\rI'm from Anthrophil myself, but it's been a while since I've been home.

: When [No]

 @>

 :    : They took my <b>Poliwhirl</b>!

@>Text: \xn[Eve]\rI can see you've got some gym badges so maybe the two of us can take them on.

: When [Help her.]

 @>Text: Eve joined the party!
 @>Script: pbAddDependency2(@event_id,"Eve",2)

 @>
: When [Not now.]

Event ID: 003
Event Name: EV003
(X,Y): (012,006)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \rI'm part of a new expeditionary Pokémon medicine 
  :    : team. It's called Nurses without borders.
 @>Text: \rYou can stay here and restore your Pokémon for a 
  :    : small fee.
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
  @>Text: \rI'm sorry but I can't heal your Pokémon 
   :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
   :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?\nThe cost 
   :    : is $\v[3].
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rAlright, see you next time.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rI'm part of a new expeditionary Pokémon medicine 
  :    : team. It's called Nurses without borders.
 @>Text: \rDo your Pokémon need to rest?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
  @>Screen Flash: (0,0,0,255), @60
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>Text: \rThere, all better!
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rOkay, be safe!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 009
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
  @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
   :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
   :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?\nThe cost 
   :    : is $\v[3].
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
  :       : for i in 1..count
  :       :   pbSet(6,i)
  :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
  :       :   pbWait(16)
  :       : end
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation ON
  @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
  @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
   @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
   @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
    :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
   @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
    :    : exceptionally well.
   @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
   @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
    :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pkmn = $Trainer.first_pokemon
 :       : pkmn.hp = 1
 @>Text: \rWe managed to bring your first Pokémon back with 
  :    : low HP. Do you want to fully heal your party?
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
    :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
    :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
   @>
  : Else
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else

    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
  :    : health.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Day Care Lady
(X,Y): (004,008)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbEggGenerated?
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rAh, there you are! My father was looking for 
  :    : you.
 @>Exit Event Processing
 @>
: Branch End
@>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited == 0
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rI'm the Day-Care Girl. We can raise Pokémon for 
  :    : you.
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rWould you like us to raise your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.pokemon_count <= 1
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rOh? But you only have one Pokémon with you.
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rYou can't go off without a Pokémon. Come back 
    :    : another time.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rWhich Pokémon should we raise for you?
  @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1, 3)
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rOh, fine, then.\nCome again.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbCheckAble(pbGet(1))
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rIf you leave me that Pokémon, what are you gonna 
    :    : battle with?
   @>Text: \rCome back another time.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Script: pbDayCareDeposit(pbGet(1))
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rFine, we'll raise your \v[3] for a while.
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rCome back for it later.
  @>Label: RaiseAnother
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rWe can raise two of your Pokémon. Would you like 
   :    : us to raise another?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.pokemon_count <= 1
    @>Text: \rOh? But you only have one Pokémon with you.
    @>Text: \rYou can't go off without a Pokémon. Come back 
     :    : another time.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rWhich Pokémon should we raise for you?
   @>Script: pbChooseNonEggPokemon(1, 3)
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: !pbCheckAble(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rIf you leave me that Pokémon, what are you gonna 
     :    : battle with?
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rCome back another time.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: pbDayCareDeposit(pbGet(1))
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rFine, we'll raise your \v[3] for a while.
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rCome back for it later.
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == ON
    @>Jump to Label: TakeBack
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rOh, fine, then.\nCome again.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rAh, it's you! Good to see you. Now, about your 
  :    : Pokémon...
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareGetLevelGain(0, 3, 4) && pbGet(4) > 0
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareGetLevelGain(1, 3, 4) && pbGet(4) > 0
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rBy level, your \v[3] has grown by about \v[4].
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited == 1
  @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
  @>Jump to Label: RaiseAnother
  @>
 : Else
  @>Label: TakeBack
  @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rDo you want your Pokémon back?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Label: TakeBackChosen
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.party_full?
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rYour Pokémon team is full. Make room, then come 
     :    : see me.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: pbDayCareChoose(
   :       :   _I("Which one do you want back?"),
   :       :   1
   :       : )
   @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>Script: pbDayCareGetDeposited(pbGet(1), 3, 4)
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\G\rIf you want your \v[3] back, it will cost $\v[4].
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Control Variables: [0005: Temp Text Entry] = Gold
    @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0005: Temp Text Entry] < Variable [0004: Temp Move Name]
     @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\G\rYou don't have enough money...
     @>Exit Event Processing
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>Change Gold: - Variable [0004: Temp Move Name]
    @>Script: pbDayCareWithdraw(pbGet(1))
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\G\rExcellent\nHere's your Pokémon.
    @>Text: \PN took \v[3] back from the Day-Care Girl.
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbDayCareDeposited == 1
     @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rDo you want to take back the other one, too?
     @>Show Choices: Yes, No
     (When Cancel: Choice 2)
     : When [Yes]
      @>Jump to Label: TakeBackChosen
      @>
     : When [No]
      @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
      @>
     : Branch End
     @>
    : Else
     @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \xn[Daycare Girl]\rVery good. Come again.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 008
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (007,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: Kernel.pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $PokemonSystem.difficulty == 3
 @>Script: pC = pbPokeCenterCost($Trainer.party)
 :       : pbSet(3, pC)
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \G\rBased on your Pokémon the cost is $\v[3].
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.money <= pbGet(3)
  @>Text: \rI'm sorry but we can't heal your Pokémon 
   :    : without the appropriate funds. Come back with less 
   :    : Pokémon to heal or more money.
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \G\rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?\nThe cost 
   :    : is $\v[3].
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Play SE: 'Slots coin', 100, 100
   @>Script: $Trainer.money -= pbGet(3)
   @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
   @>Recover All: Entire Party
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Turn Left
    :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
   :       : for i in 1..count
   :       :   pbSet(6,i)
   :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
   :       :   pbWait(16)
   :       : end
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation ON
   @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
   @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
   @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
   @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
    :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
    :              : $>Turn Down
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
    @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
    @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
     :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
    @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
     :    : exceptionally well.
    @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
    @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
    @>Set Move Route: This event
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
     :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
     :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
    @>Wait for Move's Completion
    @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
 @>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
 @>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
  @>Recover All: Entire Party
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Script: count=$Trainer.pokemonCount
  :       : for i in 1..count
  :       :   pbSet(6,i)
  :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
  :       :   pbWait(16)
  :       : end
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation ON
  @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
  @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
  @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
  @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
   :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: Kernel.pbPokerus?
   @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
   @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
    :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
   @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
    :    : exceptionally well.
   @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
   @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
   @>Set Move Route: This event
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
    :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
    :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
   @>Wait for Move's Completion
   @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 002
Event Name: giovanni
(X,Y): (005,003)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trainer_ROCKETBOSS

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Play ME: '135-trainer appears (bad guy chapter)', 100, 100
@>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]I was wondering when you might 
 :    : show up again.
@>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]You've been hindering our efforts. But you 
 :    : don't understand that you're powerless to stop us.
@>Set Move Route: [giovanni]
 :              : $>Turn toward Player
@>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]I've allowed this meeting to take place you see. 
 :    : I planted the SILPH PASS in the basement. I organized 
 :    : for the capture of that girl's Poliwhirl.
@>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]We've been watching you \PN.\nI want to make you an offer.
@>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]How would you like to recieve the most 
 :    : powerful Pokémon.\nStand by me and help me crush 
 :    : the Cardino region to total submission.
@>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]\PN I'm offering you a position as my right hand.
 :    : You've proven your strength now all you need do is 
 :    : reach out and grasp this offer.
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Disallow)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]Excellent, I figured you might say that.
  :    : Now just hand over your Pokémon and we'll get 
  :    : started.
 @>Show Choices: Hand over Pokemon, No.
 (When Cancel: Disallow)
 : When [Hand over Pokemon]
  @>Text: \b\l[3]\PN hands their Pokémon over to Giovanni.
  @>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]Excellent.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @60
  @>Wait: 60 frame(s)
  @>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\l[3]\PN, having fallen for Giovanni's trick, was taken 
   :    : prisoner and unable to continue their Pokémon 
   :    : adventure.
  @>Text: \l[3 <b>GAME OVER </b>
  @>Transfer Player:[162: 7F Silpho Co], (015,006)
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @10
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : When [No.]
  @>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]I had a suspicion that you might be too clever 
   :    : for that trick. No matter, I will handle you myself.
  @>Jump to Label: a
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]I had a suspicion that you might be too clever 
  :    : for that trick. No matter, I will handle you myself.
 @>Jump to Label: a
 @>
: Branch End
@>Label: a
@>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]We've acquired some very powerful Pokémon 
 :    : via hijacking the Pokémon trading network.
@>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]I have a little surprise in store for you, let me demonstrate.
@>Script: pbTrainerIntro(:ROCKETBOSS)
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbTrainerBattle(:ROCKETBOSS,"Giovanni",_I("Bravo."))
 @>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\bDefeating the Mega Evolution?\nHow unexpected.
 @>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]No matter.\nMy defeat is inconsequential, you may have won 
  :    : the battle but I will win the war \PN.
 @>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]I own this city, you're utterly powerless to stop us. 
  :    : All of the Pokémon are being transported to a secure 
  :    : location far from the reach the law.
 @>Text: \xn[Giovanni]\b\l[3]\bEvery second that goes by, we're 
  :    : stealing Pokémon by the thousands, searching 
  :    : through each and every trainer PC.
 @>Text: \bWe might even find yours\n
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @20
 @>Wait: 60 frame(s)
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>Control Switches: [0111: giovannidefeated1] = ON
 @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(4,"B",true)
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @20
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbTrainerEnd
@>

 @>Text: Please choose one.\ch[1,-1,
  :    : NO FORM,HEAT,WASH,
  :    : FROST,FAN,MOWER]
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == -1
  @>Text: \c[0]Default text, \c[1]blue text, \c[2]red text, \c[3]
   :    : green text, \c[4]cyan text, \c[5]magenta text, \c[6]
   :    : yellow text, \c[7]grey text, \c[8]white text.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
  @>Script: for pkmn in $Trainer.pokemonParty
  :       :   if isConst?(pkmn.species,PBSpecies,
  :       :               :ROTOM)
  :       :     pkmn.form=0
  :       :     pbSet(1,pkmn.name)
  :       :     break
  :       :   end
  :       : end
  @>Text: \v[1] has changed to \c[8]NORMAL form.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 1
  @>Script: for pkmn in $Trainer.pokemonParty
  :       :   if isConst?(pkmn.species,PBSpecies,
  :       :               :ROTOM)
  :       :     pkmn.form=1
  :       :     pbSet(1,pkmn.name)
  :       :     break
  :       :   end
  :       : end
  @>Text: \v[1] has changed to \c[2]HEAT form.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 2
  @>Script: for pkmn in $Trainer.pokemonParty
  :       :   if isConst?(pkmn.species,PBSpecies,
  :       :               :ROTOM)
  :       :     pkmn.form=2
  :       :     pbSet(1,pkmn.name)
  :       :     break
  :       :   end
  :       : end
  @>Text: \v[1] has changed to \c[1]WASH form.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 3
  @>Script: for pkmn in $Trainer.pokemonParty
  :       :   if isConst?(pkmn.species,PBSpecies,
  :       :               :ROTOM)
  :       :     pkmn.form=3
  :       :     pbSet(1,pkmn.name)
  :       :     break
  :       :   end
  :       : end
  @>Text: \v[1] has changed to \c[4]FROST form.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 4
  @>Script: for pkmn in $Trainer.pokemonParty
  :       :   if isConst?(pkmn.species,PBSpecies,
  :       :               :ROTOM)
  :       :     pkmn.form=4
  :       :     pbSet(1,pkmn.name)
  :       :     break
  :       :   end
  :       : end
  @>Text: \v[1] has changed to \c[7]FAN form.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 5
  @>Script: for pkmn in $Trainer.pokemonParty
  :       :   if isConst?(pkmn.species,PBSpecies,
  :       :               :ROTOM)
  :       :     pkmn.form=0

  :       :     break
  :       :   end
  :       : end

  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: You need ROTOM with you for me to help it change.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 @>Text: There is a questionnaire.\nWould you like to fill it out?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: \PN filled in the questionnaire.
  @>Set Move Route: [Mart]
   :              : $>Turn Down
  @>Script: pbExclaim(get_character(2))
  @>Wait: 20 frame(s)
  @>Text: \bOh, hello!\nYou filled in the questionnaire?
  @>Text: \bThat means you must know about the Mystery Gift.
  @>Text: \bFrom now on, you should be receiving Mystery 
   :    : Gifts!
  @>Script: $Trainer.mysterygiftaccess=true
  @>Text: \w[signskin]Once you save your game, you can 
   :    : access the Mystery Gift.
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 :    : want to trade me for my <b>POLIWAG</b>?

  :       : variable 1. A value of -1 means no Pokémon was 
  :       : chosen.
  :       : The chosen Pokémon's name goes in game variable 2.

  :       : pkmn.iv[2]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[3]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[4]=25
  :       : pkmn.iv[5]=30

  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:REFRESH)
  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:HAZE)

  :       : pkmn.pbLearnMove(:ICEBALL)
  :       : pkmn.makeMale
  :       : pkmn.setAbility(1)   # Hidden Ability
  :       : pkmn.setNature(:NAUGHTY)
  :       : pkmn.ballused=15     # Cherish Ball
  :       : pkmn.makeShiny
  :       : pkmn.calcStats

   :    : POLIWAG</b>!
